unittitle_ssm: Index to A Social History of Flatbush
abstract_ssm: A handwritten index to the book, "Social History of Flatbush" by Gertrude Lefferts Vanderbilt, published in 1882. The index was created by Frances Bergen Cropsey in 1959. The Brooklyn Historical Society's Othmer Library also holds a typewritten copy of the index in its main collection.
collection_ssm: Index to A Social History of Flatbush
